channel.title: ML on Unladen swallow - Olivier Wulveryck

item.title: Chrome, the eye of the cloud - Computer vision with deep learning and only 2Gb of RAM
item.description: TL;DR: Thank you for passing by. This article is, as usual, geek oriented. However, if you are not a geek, and/or you are in a hurry, you can jump to the conclusion: Any real application? During the month of may, I have had the chance to attend to the Google Next event in London and the dotAI in Paris. In both conferences I learned a lot about machine learning.
